sentence.Network_en: Even more stinging criticism came from Ms Yade.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚德女士甚至还发表了更激烈的批评言辞.

sentence.Network_en: And he gave Rama Yade, a feisty 31 - year - old Senegalese , a human - rights post in the foreign ministry.
sentence.Network_cn: 此外,他还让脾气暴躁的31岁 塞内加尔人 拉玛?亚德(RamaYade)在外交部掌管人权事务.

sentence.Network_en: Even Rama Yade, the junior sports minister, denounced the team for staying in a five - star hotel.
sentence.Network_cn: 即便是青少年体育部长拉玛?亚德, 也指责球队住在五 星级 酒店里.
